summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 50th Avenue Northwest, from East 65th Street to East 75th Street; by grading, constructing concrete sidewalks and watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14309 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
